pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, March 13, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting by teleconference.

Closed to media.

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will address Canadians from Rideau Cottage. A media availability will follow.

Rideau Cottage
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 11:45 a.m. and to make their way to the P1 Gate once on the grounds.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists who are not members of the Parliamentary Press Gallery should contact Pierre Cuguen at pierre.cuguen@parl.gc.ca to obtain temporary accreditation.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers. Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland and Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam will also participate.

Closed to media.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a call with national Indigenous leaders. Minister of Indigenous Services Marc Miller and Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam will also participate.

Closed to media.
